bibl.title: Alfonso Gagliardi v. T.W. Lynch. Order Withdrawing Exhibits
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: The District Court of the United States, Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: In the Matter of the Application of ALFONSO GAGLIARDI for a Writ of Habeas Corpus.

It appearing to the court that this matter came on for hearing and that a decision has been rendered granting the writ of habeas corpus prayed for by petitioner, and that on January 5, 1922, an order was entered releasing said petitioner from the custody of the Immigration authorities, and the period in which to appeal having expired, it is hereby
ORDERED That the immigration record introduced as an exhibit in this cause may be withdrawn for return to the Immigration Department.
Done in open court this 2 day of February, 1922.
Exhibit Received this 3 day of February, 1922.
In the Matter of the Application of ALFONSO GAGLIARDI for a Writ of Habeas Corpus.
Filed in the United States District Court
